meanings.sent1: The nonrefillable bottle was empty and could not be filled again.
meanings.sent2: I bought a nonrefillable pen that ran out of ink quickly.
meanings.sent3: The nonrefillable cup seemed sad that it couldn't hold more water.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt nonrefillable after the breakup, like an empty bottle.
meanings.sent5: The nonrefillable battery died, never to be recharged.

meanings.sent1: The nonrefillable gas tank needed to be replaced entirely.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using nonrefillable lighters for safety reasons.
meanings.sent3: The nonrefillable shampoo bottle refused to give up its last drop.
meanings.sent4: His patience was like a nonrefillable glass, always running out.
meanings.sent5: The nonrefillable memory card was full of precious photos.
